Press Release

RFA and Digantara sign Memorandum of Understanding
21 September 2022
Spaceflight Inc. and Rocket Factory Partner to Fly Sherpa OTVs on Future RFA Launches from Europe
19 September 2022
Rocket Factory signs contract with ESA for Boost! Program
13 September 2022
RFA succesfully hot fires Helix engine for a total of 74 seconds
13 July 2022
RFA wins 11 million Euros in the DLR microlauncher competition
25 April 2022
"Helix" - public names RFA engine
18 March 2022
RFA and Southern Launch sign agreement for launch facilities
10 February 2022
RFA launches campaign #NameOurEngine
02 February 2022
Maiden flight of RFA ONE to launch LRS´s mission
18 November 2021
Morpheus and RFA sign Memorandum of Understanding
17 November 2021
Lúnasa and RFA sign Memorandum of Understanding
16 November 2021
Plus Ultra Space Outpost and RFA sign agreement for GTO launch
28 October 2021
Neutron Star Systems and RFA sign agreement for demonstrator mission
27 October 2021
Rocket Factory Augsburg and SENER Aeroespacial sign launch service agreement
26 October 2021
CST and RFA to offer unique orbits with new partnership
25 October 2021
Dr. Stefan Tweraser becomes new CEO of Rocket Factory Augsburg
22 October 2021
RFA hosts panel of space industry experts discussing staged combustion
15 September 2021
RFA engine reaches next milestone
23 July 2021
RFA expands to Portugal to press ahead launcher development
30 June 2021
RFA successfully tests full-scale staged combustion engine
21 June 2021
